headline.main: City Is Prepared in Event of Air Attack To Shelter and Evacuate Its Seven Million

lead_paragraph: A comprehensive plan for control and shelter of New York City's 7,000,000 inhabitants in the event of a disaster--a category in which a bombing attack or hostile invasion would fall--has been drawn by the Board of Disaster Control which was set up following the power and ...
